title: 3 and Out - Nomad Coaching Life; Joe Brady Express; Reid/Rodgers Pressure; AFC/NFC Championship Previews ATS; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Nomad Coaching Life; Joe Brady Express; Reid/Rodgers Pressure; AFC/NFC Championship Previews ATS; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff explains why football coaches are the ultimate nomads of professional sports coaches, looks at the meteoric rise of Panthers coordinator Joe Brady, why he could be a head coaching candidate next year if he stays hot, looks at the pressure on Andy Reid and Aaron Rodgers on championship weekend, and previews the AFC and NFC Championship games. He also answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
